content: I ordered something from this particular application. The order was recived by somebody else and was not in my knowing. Even the delivery patner didn't pick up the call after delivering it at a wrong place. This kind of poor and awful service is not what we expect from Zepto. Now the item i needed urgently is out of stock and I am completely helpless. I would recommend everybody to not pay before the order arrives. Unexpected from Zepto

Hello Team, I am extremely disappointed with the resolution provided. This issue is not about product condition or expectations. The core problem is that your app search functionality displayed incorrect results, which directly led to ordering the wrong product. This is a system/app issue, not a customer error. Stating that the product matches the order placed does not address the root cause, especially when the order itself was influenced by inaccurate app
